ngoList.title: Shree Rangaranga Havyasi Kalavrunda
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The last decade of the 20th century had witnessed number of theatre personalities and activities given by generally SHREE RANGARANGA(R) particularly RANGARANGA so as to retain the reputation of Tumkur, which was booned in our National Theatre by late Nataka Rathna, Dr. Gubbi Veeranna. Veteran Theatre Artist, Well known Director, Designer, Writer and a Very Good organiser Mr.H.M. Rangaiahs interaction with alumni of National School of Drama. New Delhi, such as Late Sri.B.V.Karanth, G.V.Iyer, C.G.Krishnaswamy (CGK), G.V.Shivananda, V.Ramamurthy, C.Basavalingaiah, H. Janardhan (Janni), Gopalakrishna Nairy and many others, has derived a gradual and constant theatre organiser named "SHREE RANGARANGA" as suggested by the above said theatre dignitaries and got in to registered on 2nd January 1987. The same Organisation was Inaugurated by Mr. S. Mallikarjunaiah, the present member of parliament on 25th January 1987. We are the pioneers in the Children theatre Movement in Karnataka, we are specially conducting the State level Children Drama Festivals since from 23 years continuously from 1987 to 2009. Every year for the occasions of the Republic Day celebration. Which will attract the children troupes through out the length and breadth of Karnataka. To this occasions our Organization will invite the Stalwarts. Of course with booster cultural activities in Urban and Rural level the Organisation stood participate in National Level Theatre festival at New Delhi, Mumbai and lucknow (Ooru Bhanga), NSD Festival New Delhi is an unique repute the experiment and innovate aesthetics of theatre and every genre of performing Arts and Culture of the Country. We are also organising National and State Festivals like Independence Day, Republic Day, Gandhi Jayanthi, Dr.B.R.Ambedkar Jayanthi with May Day, Karmika Dinacharane, World Theatrical Day and other celebrations. Cultural competitions, Discussions on theatre with stalwarts of theatre movement, recognition of senior personalities in the field of theatre and felicitating them. Workshops on both Art and folk performing Art, Development of a Magazine Ranga Balaga concentrating on the development of the Dramaturgy, Workshops on Stage crafts, Acting, Makeup and also organised Ranga Geethotsva. For this occasions the Organisation We Invite our District Collect-or as we1l as cultural personalities like We have bagged a quite number of awards and prizes to say few of them to your kind notice. Benakana Kere, Doli, vyavasthe has won lot of . appreciation and has secured lot of prizes at Bangalore Yuva Ranga, Udupi Ranga Bhoomi, Mumbai Karnataka Sanga and Lucknow Kannada Sanga respectively. Mr.H.M.Rangaiah, who is the Founder Secretary of the above said Organisation, is an Awardee of Karnataka Nataka Academy and Dr. B.R.Ambedkar.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: We are running well equipped Allopathy & Ayurvedic Hospital with total bed strength (150+220) 370. We are also running Naturopathy and Yoga Centre with provision for 50 indoor admissions & 30% of beds are reserved for free treatment to poor patients. All maternity cases & Poor Patients are provided free food & free medicines for very poor patients. 1st & 2nd delivery services are free. Immunisations services to children and pregnant women are free. Free services for Family Planning Programmes Working women Hostel accommodating 96 working women is functioning excellently. Reguralerly we conduct Free Health checkup and treatment camps in surrounding villages. Health education campus along with implementation of MCH Progremmes in nearby villages are conducted free of cost. Approximately 8 to 10 such camps arranged per year. GNM, B.Sc & M.Sc Nursing courses are provided, for development & empowerment of women. Separate Hostels are provided for Male & Female students. Various clinical courses are conducted by Institute. As per Government guidelines, specific No. of seats in these courses are reserved for SC & ST Students. M.Sc Nursing courses are being conducted in 1) Pediatric 2) Medical Surgical 3) O.B.G Services. We conduct various community health awareness programmes, to provide guidance for healthy life style practices, healthy food habits. We provide awareness regarding clarifications of false & wrong beliefs & ideas, about health related issues. We always strive to provide, awareness regarding availability of various health services in the nearby villages & see to it that, the community people actually participate in community health programmes.

ngoList.address: B H Road, Tumkur, 572103
ngoList.title: SIDDAGANGA INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Siddaganga Institute of Technology, Tumkur popularly known as SIT established in the year 1963, is one among 125 institutions run by Sree Siddaganga Education Society, headed by His Holiness Dr. Sree Sree Sivakumara Swamiji, a centenarian. Sree Sree Swamiji is shouldering the onerous responsibility of providing free food, shelter and education to over 9000 children drawn from the poor sections of the society without discrimination on the basis of caste, creed or community at Sree Siddaganga Gurukula. In addition to this, Swamiji receives thousands of pilgrims and devotees everyday. He looks after the affairs of more than 125 educational institutions and even at the age of 110 years, Swamiji works 18 hours a day. SIT campus is spread over 50 acres and the whole area is landscaped and is lush green. Tumkur enjoys the same salubrious climate as that of Bangalore. At the time of inception, the institute was offering only 3 branches namely Civil, Electrical and Mechanical Engineering with a total annual intake of 120. The institute is now offering 12 UG programmes with a total annual intake of 950 and 16 PG Programmes with a total annual intake of 432. 16 departments of the institute are recognised as research centres by Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belgaum, where students can register for Ph.D programme and M.Sc. by Research. 186 research scholars are pursuing their Ph.D degree in our research centres and so far 31 research scholars have obtained Ph.D degree from our research centres. All the departments in the institute have well equipped laboratories. The institute has over 2200 computers and are located in 29 Computer Centres which are all networked with fibre optic backbone. Round the clock internet facility is provided to all the Computer Laboratories, Faculty Chambers, Hostels, Class Rooms, through 100 Mbps leased line.

Integrated Energy centers are solar powered community centers that can host a range basic services and activities lacking in an under-served community. The center aims at positively impacting quality of life, education and livelyhoods by addressing fundamental energy needs and services relying on energy.
